Uses of Class
org.mrcp4j.message.MrcpMessage

Packages that use MrcpMessage
org.mrcp4j.client Provides interfaces and classes for implementing MRCPv2 clients. 
org.mrcp4j.message Provides classes for representing the different MRCPv2 message types. 
org.mrcp4j.message.request Provides classes for representing and constructing MRCPv2 request messages.
